document.full_text: moses mzila ndlovu, co-minister of national healing and a leader of a faction of the movement for democratic change, was released on $500 bail on wednesday after five nights in jail.
document.title: africa: zimbabwe: jailed politician is released on bail
lines_and_colors: moses mzila ndlovu, co-minister of national healing and a leader of a faction of the movement for democratic change, was released on $500 bail on wednesday after five nights in jail.
